sentences.english: There are lots of knited goods in the presents.
sentences.chinese: 送來的禮物裏面有很多是針織品。

sentences.english: We venture into a building and discovered a fabric mall.
sentences.chinese: 我們走進一座建築，發現那是針織品購物商場。

sentences.english: As you know, we're a large knitwear importer.
sentences.chinese: 你也知道，我們是一家大的針織品進口商。

sentences.english: This last consignment of hosiery is quite up to standard.
sentences.chinese: 這批新到的針織品完全符合規格。

sentences.english: Do sufficient from one generation to foreign trade custom-made fashion knitwear transaction platform.
sentences.chinese: 做足從一件代發到外貿定做的時尚針織品交易平臺。

sentences.english: Brook has also done a large amount of commercial swimwear, sportswear and hosiery modeling.
sentences.chinese: 布魯克還做了大量的商業泳裝，運動裝和針織品建模。

sentences.english: We are regular buyers of men's knitwear.
sentences.chinese: 我們是購買男用針織品的老客戶。
